greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients in an asymptotic expansion of sequence A261239.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..400
formula: For n>0, a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} A261254(k) * Stirling2(n-1, k-1).
mathematica: Flatten[{1, Table[Sum[CoefficientList[Assuming[Element[x, Reals], Series[E^(4/x)*x^4/ExpIntegralEi[1/x]^4, {x, 0, 25}]], x][[k+1]] * StirlingS2[n-1, k-1], {k, 1, n}], {n, 1, 25}]}]
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 12 2015
